ygData.subject: Double Wammie!
ygData.msgSnippet: This weekend my guild decided to try out Naggy with alts on friday so we could get our hands on another rez stick afterwards.  we got him, he dropped a CoF and
ygData.messageBody:
This weekend my guild decided to try out Naggy with alts on friday so we
could get our hands on another rez stick afterwards. we got him, he dropped
a CoF and 2 9/25 piercers. Then we waited for rage, and waited, and waited
some more, finally on sunday Rage showed up, and dropped 3 red scales woot.
I log out afterwards cause had to go out of town for a few hours. When I
log in later, they're buffing up for Gore, so I got there asap and I got my
white scale from her! I'm in utter shock, got my 2 scales on the same day,
now its just a matter of time before phinny drops his spine for me. Just
wanted to share my luck 8)

Minkin
one very happy bard
RIP
A Ro
